name: Our Sacrifice
description:
Hi, this is “Our Sacrifice” game. This game is made by me in less than 1 day and I tried to make this as fun as possible. As I’m new in game development scene, I don’t know much about sound design and programming, so I left the sound aspect of the game out for this jam.

Rate the game: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/$13426434264
